p: The index shown in Figure 3 comprises the absolute number of HWs per year (HW-N) and is strongly related to the index describing the number of days ( Figure 4) that contribute to HWs per year (HW-F). The absolute number of days that contribute to HWs influences the number and the duration of the events but HW-F is not equal to HW-D multiplied with HW-N, because HW-D indicates the duration of the longest event, not the average duration [ 14].
